title: Obari
author: Obari
content: Please is there anyone that can offer me a non collateral loan upto $100 I will pay $130 in one month time.Thanks

comments.author: shasan
comments.created_time: January 08, 2023, 09:55:44 AMLast edit: January 08, 2023, 10:47:26 AM by shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on January 08, 2023, 09:50:13 AMPlease is there anyone that can offer me a non collateral loan upto $100 I will pay $130 in one month time.Thanks I can give you 100$. You can post your wallet id so that I can send the dollar to you. Your rank is not enough good but you have earned 50 merits within the last 120 days. So, I think you will not destroy your account for 100$/130$. Waiting for your wallet so that I can send the fund to your wallet.

So, I think you will not destroy your account for 100$/130$. Waiting for your wallet so that I can send the fund to your wallet.Can I send you my wallet address in your inbox?Yes, you can. The loan amount 100$ and the repayment amount 130$, repayment should be on or before 7th February 2023. If this term is okay then please send your wallet id whether here or on the Bitcointalk direct message (inbox). Hope all will be okay, thanks.Edit:Sent.Please repay on or before the due date to 31o4FAgLfkBaRReeZLqZZtbrzUtFdaT3jbI have not posted trx as you have sent the wallet on private message.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on January 27, 2023, 09:43:46 AMI have paid in full $100 and $30 interest making nit $130Please confirm the payment and make a comment on this post please This is one of the good lessons that I have got full repayment with 30% interest but still a 5% loss for the price hike. I have given 2 loans in btc base on USD values at the almost same time and on both, I am a loser. So, in the future I will give only USDT and receive USDT, and if other cryptos then repayment will be based on that crypto not based on USD value. Anyway, thank you very much for the early repayment. Neutral trust already removed.
